title: Justa simple question
body:
hey, pool party miss fortune skin is going to be released? instead of a watergun barrage with her ult, maybye she can just take a water hose...
it might be a dumb idea, peopel might make fun of me cuz i dont rlly keep in touch with whats happening (theres bound to be someone in rito who thought of a waterhose), it might be hard to change and have technical issues, but im just asking. call me stupid if you want, but im just asking.

replies.body: good idea.  perhaps pool party velcoz would be a better fit though? ;)
SEE I FRICKIN CALLED IT THERE WAS GONNA BE SOMEONE SMART COMMIN IN HERE AND BE LIKE "I just rekt your whole theory". Your right though
pool party velkoz would be so sick, so sick that he would need to visit the doctor
Make sure it's a fire hose. We need something strong enough to push Pool Party Fiora back to the drawing board so they can fix her hair and get rid of that unsightly tattoo.
